nodes.bodyText: Why change the range here？I think previous 2 * EXPIRE_TIME is better, since it proves that the expireEntry has not exist in repository now.

Why change the range here？I think previous 2 * EXPIRE_TIME is better, since it proves that the expireEntry has not exist in repository now.

In this case what want to be proved is  entry which  exceed EXPIRE_TIME will be eliminate not the 2 * EXPIRE_TIME.  2 * EXPIRE_TIME can pass the test case ， but not strictly.
The last assertion has proved the case, and the new range here is more clearer semantically and strictly. I agree, it's ok.
